author: lundblad
msg: Follow-up to r19462.  Fix example config file in nightly test scripts.

author: danderson
msg: (the-changes-file): Add a general overview of the CHANGES file, and

writing procedure.  Rephrase the branch naming to conform to the
style used in the rest of the document.

author: dlr
msg: (the-changes-file): Add Ben Collins-Sussman's description of how
to write the CHANGES file for a branch.  Also add a stub sub-section
for adding content for a patch release.

author: lgo
msg: Improve performance of the python tests by not creating a working copy when none is needed.
Updated copyright date of the tests to 2006 where needed.
(Sandbox.build): Allow the user to pass an option to disable the creation of a working copy.
(make_repo_and_wc): When create_wc option is False do not checkout the working copy.
Make sure the svn-test-work/working_copies folder is created
The following tests are all changed to not request a working copy to be
